title: Multiply by $$1$$
text: The first step is to multiply the measurement to be converted by 1; write $$1$$ as a fraction relating the units given and the units needed.

title: Relating in. to cm
text: The conversion from inches to centimeters is $$1$$ $$in.=2.54$$ cm.

title: Writing $$1$$ as a Fraction
text: Using the relation between in. and cm, we can rewrite the $$1$$ we multiply in the first step as $$(2.54$$ cm)/(1 in.), so we get the expression (75 in.)*(2.54 cm)/(1 in.).

title: Simplifying
text: in. divides out, so we get the expression (75)*(2.54 cm)/(1).

title: Multiplying
text: Multiplying the expression, we get the final answer $$190.5$$ cm.
